entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for June 11, 2024
The Far Side comic 2 for June 11, 2024

summary.caption: Regrettably, Professor DeWitt’s boasting fell on too many jealous ears, and that night, as he stumbled from the bar, he was etherized by an unknown assailant and “relieved” of his trophy.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for June 11, 2024

summary.caption: “You idiot! … Twenty bucks for a smoke alarm and we don’t even know what the stuff is!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for June 11, 2024

summary.caption: “Listen out there! We’re George and Harriet Miller! We just dropped in on the pigs for coffee! We’re coming out! … We don’t want trouble!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for June 11, 2024
